comment: The pathology report describes a mixed bronchopulmonary adenocarcinoma. The tumor is completely removed by wedge excision of sample 1 and the visceral pleura, the right upper lobe of sample 2, including its resection margin of the bronchus and vessels and all the lymph nodes removed are tumor-free. Based on the available evidence, the estimated tumor stage is IA. The tumor classification is pT1, pN0, R0.
